action.description: The committee on JHA recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 9 Ayes: Representative(s) Tarnas, Kahaloa, Takayama, Todd, Garcia; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Poepoe, Belatti, Perruso, Shimizu;  Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Cochran, Hashem.
